positions.title: Technical Support Manager
description: Developed internal tools for warehouse management resulting in a reduction in sorting time and increase in employee productivity
Solved all office hardware, software and technical issues
Managed crews of up to 10 people, taking inventory records and coordinating inventory placement for maximum efficiency
Achieved 100% customer satisfaction through frequent communication and accessibility
Screened, hired and onboarded new crew workers

positions.title: Crew Lead
description: Trained new employees on safety, and moving techniques and supervised crews of up to 10
Made inventories and records of the furniture, material and supplies received for delivery. Delivered and made sure that each is well accounted for

positions.title: Mover/Driver
description: Loaded, packed and unpacked items, disassembled and assembled furniture for residential and commercial accounts
Provided safe, on-time, and dependable transportation with a safe driving record
Ensured that no items or property were damaged and the customer was always satisfied.

positions.title: Business Manager
description: Visited residential and commercial clients, made inventory assessments and drafted job estimates with a high success rate of contracting
Improved customer satisfaction via process improvement resulting in shorter wait times, automated alerts
Increased  profitability by automating tax calculations, business expenses, and estimates

positions.title: Office Manager
description: Processed car loan application & structured deals for maximum profitability
Significantly reduced noncompliance letters & fines from the DMV
Implemented online sales process, allowing customers to spend less time in the dealership
Revamped financing process to same day funding, reducing time spent after vehicle delivery
Significantly reduced document processing time by developing an in house app

positions.title: Jr. Web Developer
description: Website creation and administration. Work was with Drupal, WordPress systems. HTML, CSS, PHP, JavaScript languages, Photoshop.

positions.title: Sales Consultant
description: Reviewed product features and recommended solutions tailored to the  individual needs of the customer, providing a unique and highly personalized in-store experience
Achieved individual sales goals on a regular basis
Trained in-store sales associates and managers on Sony features and benefits
Ensured that products were properly merchandised, displayed and functional

positions.title: Moving Helper
description: Careful furniture and item relocation, packing, loading and offloading a truck, warehouse work.

positions.title: MACHINE OPERATIVE
description: Fast paced production of plastic products; operate machine(s) individually, quality control and product packaging.

positions.title: DISPATCH OPERATIVE
description: Accurate sort and assembly of customer orders; operate pallet truck

positions.title: LINE WORKER
description: Teamwork on assembly line, product packaging; quality control; Supply materials for assembly line.

positions.title: LINE WORKER
description: Fast paced production of plastic products; operate machine(s) individually, quality control and product packaging.

positions.title: LINE WORKER
description: Prepare and package product for freezing.
